imdb: Liam is stunned that Steffy did not immediately turn down Quinn's offer as he finds it evident that her only motivation is to stir Steffy back into Wyatt's arms. Steffy insists that Eric believes she is ready to lead the company. Liam angrily reiterates that Quinn is simply trying to manipulate her and implores Steffy to not fall for Quinn. At the Forrester Mansion, Quinn encourages Wyatt not to give up on his marriage. Meanwhile, Ridge visits his father to tell him that he and Brooke are back together. Ridge is stunned when Eric not only disagrees with his suggestion that it would be the perfect timing to let him and Brooke run Forrester Creations together, but also informs him that he has promised the CEO position to Steffy.
